english: He long urged the abolition of capital punishment .
Trivial formalities have been done away with .
Many teachers wish to abolish the cane .
chinese: 很多教师希望废除用藤条等的体罚。

english: He tried to do away with the obsolete regulations .
chinese: 他试图废除过时的规则。

english: The chinese people have happily put an end to tipping .
chinese: 中国人有幸废除了小费。
废除造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: She thinks it is time we did away with the monarchy .
chinese: 她认为该是废除君主制的时候了。

english: In 1638 he had to concede the abolition of the court .
chinese: 1638年他被迫认可该法院的废除。

english: Dr. proudie would abolish all forms and ceremonies .
chinese: 普劳迪博士要废除各种仪式与礼节。

english: The legislature repealed the unpopular rent act ...
chinese: 立法机关废除了不得人心的租借法案。

english: Everything that the puritans fought for was overthrown .
chinese: 清教徒为之战斗的一切又统统被废除了。

english: At last he does write from philadelphia terminating the engagement .
chinese: 最后，他才从费城来信废除婚约。

english: He abolished the operations coordinating board and the planning board .
chinese: 他废除了行动协调委员会和计划委员会。

english: The marriage usages in which they originated have long since disappeared .
chinese: 它所渊源的婚姻习俗很早以前即已废除了。
